com.madisp.stupid

Interface Expression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Value
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndExpression, ApplyExpression, AssignExpression, BlockExpression, CallExpression, ConstantExpression, DivisionExpression, MinusExpression, MultiplicationExpression, NegateExpression, NotExpression, OrExpression, PlusExpression, ResourceExpression, StatementListExpression, TernaryExpression, VarExpression

    public interface Expression
extends Value
    Expression is simply a Value with a (possibly empty) set of sub-expressions. It is useful for analyzing the expression tree outside of evaluation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression[] children()
      Get the set of sub-expressions, if any.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.madisp.stupid.Value

        value

    • Method Detail

      • children

        Expression[] children()
        Get the set of sub-expressions, if any.
        Returns:
        an array of sub-expressions, it may be an empty array
